---

Developed by [urdefhans](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=158) for their [skaveling](/Monsters.aspx?ID=803) mounts but quickly copied by other races' cavalry, this leather saddle is made from [cave worm](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=21) hide and is designed to fit a variety of flying steeds. In addition to a seat for the rider, the _bomber's saddle_ has a bomb compartment situated underneath the mount. The compartment can hold up to six [alchemical bombs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-bombs) of light or negligible Bulk.
